name: Bullet Curve 3D: Perfect Shot
description:
Welcome to Bullet Curve 3D: Perfect Shot!
Use your skills to shoot the targets. Aim for the right ones!
Curve the bullet as you wish to get the maximum points.
There are multiple levels in which you can enjoy.
We suggest you, beware of your enemies and keep your attention all time!
Maybe then, finally, you can be king of the shooters!
